title: I feel friends & people around me are envious causing me Laziness Anxiety Depression assim al hakeem
transcript: sh I have a very serious issue um I'll try to sum up everything shortly during my school days uh I didn't have much knowledge about life and Islam and I was very easygoing and I was an excellent student later on when covid came I started exploring everything about life and Islam and alhamdulillah Allah subhah guided me and I started getting very ambitious like these are my worldly and religious goals and I want to achieve them but at the same time uh I didn't put the right efforts and execute all the things well but for the last two years I'm trying my heart and soul to achieve the goals I said for myself and I'm putting in efforts but I'm kind of stuck in a loop where I work some days and I feel like I'm improving and then after that I fall into sing again and being lazy not feeling like working anxiety depression and all the stuffs initially I thought that maybe everything is my called and I'm not putting the right efforts but recently I feel like I can't always feel like I'm not putting the right efforts because I'm trying the same thing for the last two years uh I feel like it would be something like e NB Etc because I noticed that a lot of people around me are envious of me and they are like oh how are you so good in studies how do you learn things so quick how are you how are you so practicing how are you so ambitious about life and etc etc um it's not anything like that I was working amazingly before and suddenly everything changed so the question me on this okay first of all if you are as you've stated then this is an evil eye an evil eye is cured with the grace of Allah by doing r as I mentioned in the previous question and you can find the format of the Rya on my website and also on my YouTube channel with the grace of Allah apply this on 10 20 bottles of water drink 10 bottles of water every day throughout the day till the night and inshallah in four to five days you will feel an improvement if not totally cured if not then you come back to me and I'll tell you what the problem is inshallah
